title: mahaadEva shiva shambhO
sahitya:
mahAdeva shiva shambho



shri mara koti sundara prabho







anupallavi







sahasra koti jana paalana



saadhu sam rakshana paavana



(mahaa)







caraNam







sarveshawara karunaakara mUrthe



saama gaana priyave mUrthe



parameshwara gangadhara keerthe



patita paavana shri pashupathe



(mahaa)
